content:
From: @Michael Lipton
"Any advice on how to implement this? https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/davinci-pdex-plan-net/StructureDefinition-qualification.html
So this is a search parameter on Organization and Practitioner resource for an extension? Any examples available?"

Hi @Michael Lipton - The search interface for Plan-Net is described here. There is no requirement to be able to search on this extension that may be used in Organization, PractitionerRole, and OrganizationAffiliation.

so what is expected to happen with the "qualification" entry in the "qualification of search" part of this (https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/davinci-pdex-plan-net/implementation.html#representing-and-searching-provider-directory-data) table? is that just laying out client expectations out of the scope of any initial search?

@ryan moehrke
We trimmed the search interface at some point, and clearly the table doesn't reflect this.
There is no qualification search parameter.

image.png
so does that table need updating? do you need a jira for that?
